column2: But will you let me assume, without reciting them, that these things are true?
column3: But will you let me assume, without reciting them, that these things are true?

column2: Certainly, he said, what you say is true.
column3: Certainly, he said, what you say is true.

column2: Yes, he said; and they are fair and lasting.
column3: Yes, he said; and they are fair and lasting.
